overview: The town sheriff and a madame team up to stop a television consumer advocate from shutting down the local whorehouse, the famed Chicken Ranch.
original_title: The Best Little Whorehouse in Texas
tagline: With Burt and Dolly this much fun just couldn't be legal!
cast: Burt Reynolds|Dolly Parton|Dom DeLuise|Charles Durning|Jim Nabors
